alert.note: Alert for Sonoma (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 3:58PM PST until further notice by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in California... Russian River at Johnsons Beach near Guerneville affecting Sonoma County. For the Russian River...including Johnsons Beach near Guerneville... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Russian River at Johnsons Beach near Guerneville. * WHEN...From late tonight until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 32.0 feet, Flood stage. Minor flooding. Lower Mill Street in Guerneville and Old Bohemian Highway in Monte Rio are expected to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:00 PM PST Monday the stage was 30.11 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue rising to 32.1 feet late tonight. - Flood stage is 32.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 400 AM PST.
